title: Captain Gangplank ?
body:

To get the Capt Gangplank skin I need to play as much as a normal game with gangplank till aug 10th ?

um. so like. I did a 5-man premade as Gangplank in the Black Market Brawlers and won it. Is that it enough to get the skin?? or does have be in new aram or something
Yeah, that should count as long as you owned GP by the end of the event.  All eligible players should have the skin by now.
